1380820.name: Helixian
1380820.description:
Helixian is a game I made in my spare time during of Senior year of high school and heavily developed over the summer of 2020. I've done my best to make exciting levels from the feedback of my friends along with putting much focus into exciting boss fights. I hope you enjoy my game!!! c:

- 20 Stages

- 4 Bosses

- 8 Great Sound Tracks

- 1-2 hours of content (depending on your skills and the difficulty)

- Exciting and fast pasted gameplay
1380820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
